mention.text: `` MOSCOW -LRB- Reuters -RRB- - Russian security forces killed up to five suspected militants in armed confrontations in the North Caucasus province of Dagestan on Saturday
Dagestan , a mostly Muslim region in Russia 's North Caucasus , along the country 's southern edge
